verses.verse: אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׂמַ֨ח <WH8055> Rejoice יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל ׀ <WH3478> not O Israel אֶל־ <WH413> with גִּיל֙ <WH1524> for joy כָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> as [other] people כִּ֥י <WH3588> for זָנִ֖יתָ <WH2181> for thou hast gone a whoring מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> from thy God אָהַ֣בְתָּ <WH157> thou hast loved אֶתְנָ֔ן <WH868> a reward עַ֖ל <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> every גָּרְנ֥וֹת <WH1637> threshing דָּגָֽן׃ <WH1715> corn
גֹּ֥רֶן <WH1637> The floor וָיֶ֖קֶב <WH3342> and the winepress לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִרְעֵ֑ם <WH7462> shall not feed וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <WH8492> them and the new wine יְכַ֥חֶשׁ <WH3584> shall fail בָּֽהּ׃

לֹ֥א <WH3808> They will not יֵשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> They shall not dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְשָׁ֤ב <WH7725> shall return אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> but Ephraim מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> to Egypt וּבְאַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> [things] in Assyria טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> unclean יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> and they shall eat

לֹא־ <WH3808> They will not יִסְּכ֨וּ <WH5258> They shall not offer לַיהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> [offerings] to the LORD יַיִן֮ <WH3196> wine וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֶֽעֶרְבוּ־ <WH6148> engage לוֹ֒ זִבְחֵיהֶ֗ם <WH2077> unto him their sacrifices כְּלֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> [shall be] unto them as the bread אוֹנִים֙ <WH205> of mourners לָהֶ֔ם כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֹכְלָ֖יו <WH398> all that eat יִטַמָּ֑אוּ <WH2930> thereof shall be polluted כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For לַחְמָ֣ם <WH3899> for their bread לְנַפְשָׁ֔ם <WH5315> for their soul לֹ֥א <WH3808> It will not יָב֖וֹא <WH935> shall not come בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
מַֽה־ <WH4100> What תַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> What will ye do לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> day מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> in the solemn וּלְי֖וֹם <WH3117> and in the day חַג־ <WH2282> of the feast יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold הָֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> For lo they are gone מִשֹּׁ֔ד <WH7701> because of destruction מִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4714> Egypt תְּקַבְּצֵ֖ם <WH6908> shall gather them up מֹ֣ף <WH4644> Memphis תְּקַבְּרֵ֑ם <WH6912> shall bury מַחְמַ֣ד <WH4261> them the pleasant לְכַסְפָּ֗ם <WH3701> [places] for their silver קִמּוֹשׂ֙ <WH7057> nettles יִֽירָשֵׁ֔ם <WH3423> shall possess ח֖וֹחַ <WH2336> them thorns בְּאָהֳלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH168> [shall be] in their tabernacles

בָּ֣אוּ ׀ <WH935> are come יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> The days הַפְּקֻדָּ֗ה <WH6486> of visitation בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> are come יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> the days הַשִׁלֻּ֔ם <WH7966> of recompence יֵדְע֖וּ <WH3045> shall know יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel אֱוִ֣יל <WH191> [is] a fool הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> [it] the prophet מְשֻׁגָּע֙ <WH7696> [is] mad אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man הָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> the spiritual עַ֚ל <WH5921> Because רֹ֣ב <WH7230> for the multitude עֲוֹנְךָ֔ <WH5771> of thine iniquity וְרַבָּ֖ה <WH7227> and the great מַשְׂטֵמָֽה׃ <WH4895> hatred

צֹפֶ֥ה <WH6822> The watchman אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim עִם־ <WH5973> with אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> [was] with my God נָבִ֞יא <WH5030> [but] the prophet פַּ֤ח <WH6341> [is] a snare יָקוֹשׁ֙ <WH3352> of a fowler עַל־ <WH5921> is in כָּל־ <WH3605> all דְּרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> in all his ways מַשְׂטֵמָ֖ה <WH4895> [and] hatred בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> of his God

הֶעְמִֽיקוּ־ <WH6009> They have deeply שִׁחֵ֖תוּ <WH7843> corrupted כִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> [themselves] as in the days הַגִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1390> of Gibeah יִזְכּ֣וֹר <WH2142> [therefore] he will remember עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> their iniquity יִפְק֖וֹד <WH6485> he will visit חַטֹּאותָֽם׃ <WH2403> their sins ס

כַּעֲנָבִ֣ים <WH6025> like grapes בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> in the wilderness מָצָ֙אתִי֙ <WH4672> I found יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel כְּבִכּוּרָ֤ה <WH1063> as the firstripe בִתְאֵנָה֙ <WH8384> in the fig tree בְּרֵ֣אשִׁיתָ֔הּ <WH7225> at her first time רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> I saw אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> your fathers הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> like בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> [but] they went בַֽעַל־ פְּע֗וֹר <WH1187> to Baalpeor וַיִּנָּֽזְרוּ֙ <WH5144> and separated לַבֹּ֔שֶׁת <WH1322> themselves unto [that] shame וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> became שִׁקּוּצִ֖ים <WH8251> and [their] abominations כְּאָהֳבָֽם׃ <WH157> were according as they loved

אֶפְרַ֕יִם <WH669> [As for] Ephraim כָּע֖וֹף <WH5775> like a bird יִתְעוֹפֵ֣ף <WH5774> shall fly away כְּבוֹדָ֑ם <WH3519> their glory מִלֵּדָ֥ה <WH3205> from the birth וּמִבֶּ֖טֶן <WH990> and from the womb וּמֵהֵרָיֽוֹן׃ <WH2032> and from the conception

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Yes אִם־ <WH518> lo יְגַדְּלוּ֙ <WH1431> Though they bring up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1121> their children וְשִׁכַּלְתִּ֖ים <WH7921> yet will I bereave מֵֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> them [that there shall] not [be] a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Yes גַם־ <WH1571> indeed א֥וֹי <WH188> [left] yea woe לָהֶ֖ם בְּשׂוּרִ֥י <WH5493> also to them when I depart מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> Ephraim כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I רָאִ֥יתִי <WH7200> as I saw לְצ֖וֹר <WH6865> Tyrus שְׁתוּלָ֣ה <WH8362> [is] planted בְנָוֶ֑ה <WH5116> in a pleasant place וְאֶפְרַ֕יִם <WH669> but Ephraim לְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> shall bring forth אֶל־ <WH413> about הֹרֵ֖ג <WH2026> to the murderer בָּנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> his children

תֵּן־ <WH5414> Give לָהֶ֥ם יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> them O LORD מַה־ <WH4100> how long תִּתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> what wilt thou give תֵּן־ <WH5414> ? give לָהֶם֙ רֶ֣חֶם <WH7358> womb מַשְׁכִּ֔יל <WH7921> them a miscarrying וְשָׁדַ֖יִם <WH7699> breasts צֹמְקִֽים׃ <WH6784> and dry

כָּל־ <WH3605> All רָעָתָ֤ם <WH7451> All their wickedness בַּגִּלְגָּל֙ <WH1537> [is] in Gilgal כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Indeed שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there שְׂנֵאתִ֔ים <WH8130> for there I hated עַ֚ל <WH5921> Because רֹ֣עַ <WH7455> them for the wickedness מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4611> of their doings מִבֵּיתִ֖י <WH1004> of mine house אֲגָרְשֵׁ֑ם <WH1644> I will drive them out לֹ֤א <WH3808> no אוֹסֵף֙ <WH3254> them no more אַהֲבָתָ֔ם <WH160> I will love כָּל־ <WH3605> All שָׂרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8269> all their princes סֹרְרִֽים׃ <WH5637> [are] revolters

הֻכָּ֣ה <WH5221> is smitten אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim שָׁרְשָׁ֥ם <WH8328> their root יָבֵ֖שׁ <WH3001> is dried up פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> no fruit [בְלִי־ כ] (בַֽל־ <WH1097> corruption יַעֲשׂ֑וּן <WH1077> lest ק) גַּ֚ם <WH1571> Even כִּ֣י <WH3588> though יֵֽלֵד֔וּן <WH3205> yea though they bring forth וְהֵמַתִּ֖י <WH4191> yet will I slay מַחֲמַדֵּ֥י <WH4261> [even] the beloved בִטְנָֽם׃ <WH990> [fruit] of their womb ס

יִמְאָסֵ֣ם <WH3988> will cast them away אֱלֹהַ֔י <WH430> My God כִּ֛י <WH3588> Because לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> because they did not hearken ל֑וֹ וְיִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become נֹדְדִ֖ים <WH5074> unto him and they shall be wanderers בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the nations ס
